title: S13 Ep85: The Haunting History of Tombstone
itunes:title: The Haunting History of Tombstone
description:
When President Abraham Lincoln opened up the Arizona territory to silver mining, it not only became the backdrop for stories of famous figures like Wyatt Earp, it also set the scene for some very famous paranormal activity as well. The Crystal Palace's Tim Fattig joins BEYOND the DARKNESS to talk about the haunting hstory of Tombstone, Arizona!!
